import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import "./SignUp.css" import Header from "../../components/header/Header" import Button from "../../components/button/Button" const Sign = () => { const [signup, setSignup] = useState(false) const [signData, setSignData] = useState({ username: "", password: "", confirm_password: "" }) useEffect(() => { console.log(signup) }, [signup]) return ( <>
) } export default Sign
